title: Failed native build using Java 17
body:
### Describe the bug

When I'm launching the command 
```
./mvnw package -Pnative -Dquarkus.native.container-build=true -Dquarkus.container-image.build=true
```
according to this tutorial https://quarkus.io/guides/building-native-image#creating-a-container I see the following error (see actual behaviour).

PC RAM = 16Gb

### Expected behavior

Successful build of native image according to tutorial

### Actual behavior


### How to Reproduce?

Do the tutorial https://quarkus.io/guides/building-native-image#creating-a-container using GraalVM Java 17

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin mow-mbp-20-4702 20.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 20.6.0: Wed Jun 23 00:26:31 PDT 2021; root:xnu-7195.141.2~5/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
